main.description: I'm a committed software engineer and fullstack developer, always looking for professional challenges. Team player, creative, and quick learner with extensive experience in software development. Excellent interpersonal relationships. Able to work well under stress and use time effectively
main.bio: I'am a Software Engineer with 12+ years of experience in software development. Use this bio section as your way of describing yourself and saying what you do, what technologies you like to use or feel most comfortable with, describing your personality, or whatever else you feel like throwing in.
main.contactmessage: Here is where you should write your message to readers to have them get in contact with you.

resume.skillmessage: There are some ones of my main skills

education.description: I really enjoy all the time that I spent at the university.

education.school: Alliance Française de la Havane, Cuba
education.description: The study of fereign laguages teaches and encourages respect for other peoples, it helps break barriers. I dicided learn a foreign language because it opens up a world of job opportunities

experience.title: Senior Fullstack Developer
experience.description: Create complex web application with the following stack of technologies: ExtJs (Sencha) for frontend UI, on backend PHP with Zend Framework and PostgreSQL as Database Management System. At this period I trained 10+ new developers.

experience.title: Front End Developer
experience.description: I worked as Front End Developer, turning Photoshop and Ilustrator designs into dynamic page including Javascript and CSS animations. Using HTML5, CSS3, Bootstrap, Jquery, AngularJs, Angular Material, Parallax technique and PHP.

experience.title: Fullstack Freelance Developer
experience.description: During this period I have worked as freelance with diferent stack of technologies sush as Wordpress, Symfony, AngularJs, Jquery, VueJs, Quasar Framework, MySql, PostgreSql, SQlite and SQL Server. All this has allowed me to create the ability to change, and adapt from one technology to another without much effort.

experience.title: Co-Founder and CTO at Opdomun
experience.description: Co-founder of the project together with the architect Irasel Ulacias. I have developed this system with AdonisJs, it's a Node.js MVC framework. It offers a stable eco-system to write web applications so that you can focus on business needs.

experience.title: Senior Fullstack Developer
experience.description: Development of Employee Order Stores for Johnson&Johnson's employees in Spain and France.

projects.title: Opdomun
projects.description: A platform for sales of houses in Cuba

projects.title: Tic Tac Toe
projects.description: A classic tic tac toe game showing the power of VueJs framework

projects.title: Dac.a Estudio

testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.

That Tim Baker must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
